name: Xenia Panganiban David
text: Raymond used to wonder if one day adults just wake up one morning, drink coffee and open the newspaper. I don't know when it happened, but when I realised it, I said "Gah! I'm an adult!"

source_obj.text: Raymond used to wonder if one day adults just wake up one morning, drink coffee and open the newspaper. I don't know when it happened, but when I realised it, I said "Gah! I'm an adult!"

replies.text: I don't drink coffee, but I've been reading the newspaper in the morning since I was in HS so... IDK lol
We become adults at the point we realize that adults didn't necessarily know it all, nor are capable of anything.
Sometime a few years ago I started reading BBC and other news websites, which I guess is the equivalent.  :D
Well recently the news reads like the entertainment section... and I dunno if I can count all the fakes I read  😆
